pages.index: FantasyArena - Step into the Exciting Realm of Fantasy Cricket FantasyArena HOME ABOUT US India's Premier Social Fantasy Cricket Application I accept the Privacy Policy Get the App Link 3.7 Million+ Users 3,742,956+ Contests Played 28 Million+ Transactions Download, Install, and Join Contests Download the FantasyArena app directly from our website. Hereâ€™s how to download and install. Visit website and click on the green button at the bottom to download. Click on "Open" once the download is complete. Click "Allow from this source" when prompted, and then click on install. About FantasyArena FantasyArena is India's premier Social Networking Fantasy Cricket Mobile Application. Unlike other fantasy sports apps that only let users earn by winning contests, FantasyArena offers three unique ways to earn money. Contest Winnings: Create your fantasy team for contests and win money by being in the top 75% (more rewarding than other apps that only reward the top 50%). Referral Commission: Refer users to FantasyArena using a unique code. Earn 1.5% of their contest fee when your referrals participate in paid contests. Referral Income: Earn from the referrals of your referrals, creating an extensive income network. Don't miss out on the opportunity for unlimited income and lifetime rewards. Join FantasyArena now, invite your friends and family, and start sharing your unique code today. User Testimonials "FantasyArena has completely transformed my love for cricket into an exciting and rewarding experience!" - Rahul S. "Winning contests and earning rewards on FantasyArena has been an amazing journey." - Priya K. "The referral program on FantasyArena is fantastic. It's great to earn while having fun!" - Amit P. pages.privacy-policy: FantasyArena - Privacy Policy FantasyArena HOME ABOUT US Privacy Policy Welcome to FantasyArena's Privacy Policy. Information We Collect At FantasyArena, we collect and store the following information: Your personal details (name, email, phone number) when you register. Transaction details when you participate in contests or make payments. Usage data and analytics to improve our services. How We Use Your Information We use your information to: Provide and maintain our services. Personalize your experience and improve our website. Communicate with you, including marketing messages. Data Security We implement security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access or alteration. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
